course.title: PSY 3307 Psychometric Methods (3 units)
course.desc: The rationale and problems of psychometric methods. Test construction and item analysis. Psychometric properties of tests: reliability, validity and standard error. The different types of norms. Intelligence, aptitude, interest and personality: Tests and models.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 2106. Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours programs in psychology.
